column4: I get this message when I log in to my username: "Users $HOME/.drmc file's being ignored. This prevents the default session and language to be saved. File should be owned by user and not writable by others. User's $HOME directory must be owned by user and not writable by other users."
What should I do so it won't appear???
first of all, type "ls -l /home" in your terminal
okay, the line should start with something like drwxr-xr-x
what does it say for your folder?
because you should be the only user with write access to your home directory
I get sudo: go-w: command not found
or should I do something else
ok, I will restart the x server now
at least your permission are set up correctly now
